author: rabia7933
content: What is the exact reason that the L2 are not wiling to use blob-verification  precompile in comparison to point evaluation precompile?

author: edfelten
content: Speaking for the Arbitrum team here (though I think it's the same for other L2s), the point evaluation precompile is what we need for our protocol. We don't have any need for the blob-verification precompile. The part of our protocol that runs on L1 never needs to look at an entire blob, only at a single word from a blob.
